name: Simple-Realistic Underwater (DEMO)
description:
This is a preview of my VR experience interactive game: Simple Realistic Underwater VR.  We can enjoy the beautiful underwater scenery in VR.

This preview is not in native VR game yet, so you can preview and enjoy it with any regular monitor screen.

The full version in native PC VR mode is still under development.

Commands keys :
- A,W,S,D for movement
- Mouse cursor for rotate camera view
- F11 toggle full-screen and windowed mode.
- ALT + F4 to exit

I hope you will like this preview ;)

Happy gaming and cheers,
Chris
